trans-unit.source: Provides a safe handle that represents a key (NCRYPT_KEY_HANDLE).
trans-unit.target: 提供代表金鑰 (NCRYPT_KEY_HANDLE) 的安全控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: This class should be used when working with native code that expects an NCRYPT_KEY_HANDLE.
trans-unit.target: 使用 原生程式碼預期 NCRYPT_KEY_HANDLE 時，就應該使用這個類別。

trans-unit.source: This type implements the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface.
trans-unit.target: 此類型會實作<xref:System.IDisposable>介面。

trans-unit.source: When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly.
trans-unit.target: 當您完成使用類型時，您應該會處置它直接或間接。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of the type directly, call its <xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A> method in a `try`/`catch` block.
trans-unit.target: 若要直接處置的類型，呼叫其<xref:System.IDisposable.Dispose%2A>方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。

trans-unit.source: To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 若要為其配置間接，使用語言建構例如`using`（C# 中） 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the <xref:System.IDisposable> interface topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 使用物件的實作 IDisposable 」 一節<xref:System.IDisposable>介面 > 主題。

trans-unit.source: for permission to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的權限。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeNCryptKeyHandle" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeNCryptKeyHandle" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: for permission to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫 unmanaged 程式碼的權限。

trans-unit.source: Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />.
trans-unit.target: 要求的值： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.LinkDemand" />。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />

trans-unit.source: The pre-existing handle to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的既有控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Using <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" /> returns an invalid handle.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="F:System.IntPtr.Zero" /> 傳回無效的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: The parent handle of this <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeNCryptKeyHandle" />.
trans-unit.target: 此 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeNCryptKeyHandle" /> 的父控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeNCryptKeyHandle" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeNCryptKeyHandle" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="parentHandle" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="parentHandle" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="parentHandle" /> is closed.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="parentHandle" /> 已關閉。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="parentHandle" /> is invalid.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="parentHandle" /> 無效。
